title: BRIEF-Hexagon Resources Says Mineral Resources Intends To Withdraw From Mcintosh JV
text:
BRIEF-Hexagon Resources Says Mineral Resources Intends To Withdraw From Mcintosh JV

Stock Markets 10 minutes ago (Oct 02, 2019 12:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Hexagon Resources Says Mineral Resources Intends To Withdraw From Mcintosh JV Oct 2 (Reuters) - Hexagon Resources Ltd : * RECEIVED NOTICE FROM MINERAL RESOURCES OF ITS INTENTION TO WITHDRAW FROM MCINTOSH JOINT VENTURE EFFECTIVE 31 OCT * CO WILL REGAIN 100% INTEREST IN MCINTOSH PROJECT TENEMENTS & ALL OF HIGH QUALITY DATA, SAMPLES GENERATED FROM MIN'S WORK

BRIEF-Hexagon Resources Says Mineral Resources Intends To Withdraw From Mcintosh JV
